note:
Based in Pittsburgh. I'm an engineer who is also an improv comedian, usually @ Arcade Comedy Theater downtown though I've guested elsewhere. I also do a podcast with my siblings No Story is Sacred.

My parents are scifi authors Debra Doyle(rip, ma) and James D. Macdonald. Maybe you've read some of their stuff--The Mageworlds, and honest-to-god the novelization to the Mortal Kombat movie....that got me a Sega as a tax write off as a kid...
